1.content: It had been nearly ten years since the great reduction, 1/3 of the country’s population reduced to only 1 inch tall to help conserve resources. Tinies rarely interacted with normal sized people. Taco King, the largest Mexican inspired fast food restaurant in the nation, has opened ten Taco King locations in tiny cities in the last two years. The restaurants are flourishing, and for the first time ever the ten tiny general managers have been invited to the Taco King Manager Conference, which will be attended by over 1000 regular sized people. They will also meet their district managers for the first time, who they’ve only worked with through video conference, Sandra and Michael, a normal sized married couple.
1.title: The Conference

11.content:
The ten tiny managers are split into groups of five, two different districts.

Sandra’s group:
Mike
Clay
Mel
Kim
Tabby

Michael’s group:
Corey
Chad
Johnny
Tonya
Rachel

The two groups of five are about to meet for the first time.
11.title: The beginning

111.content:
The planes had landed and the van ride was long, but the ten tiny people had finally arrived. The van dropped them at what appeared to be a giant briefcase. A small set of steps led up and into the briefcase.

“I guess we’re supposed to go in...”

The ten made their way up and saw a small compartment for their luggage. They loaded it and a few of the guys made sure it was secure.

“Now what?”

The tinies saw light quickly fade to dark and saw they were now covered by a huge shadow. They all turned and looked up and saw a gigantic woman, who, to them, appeared to be 400 feet tall.

“Hey guys! I’m Claire! I’m one of the conference organizers. We’re so excited you get to attend this year. We’ve gone through a lot of trouble to make the conference accessible for you!”

The tiny people looked up in awe. They had all been normal sized once, but had never seen a normal sized person since the great reduction. Another giant walked up and greeted Claire. He was a massive man with a huge belly.

“I’m Mark. I’m sure Claire has already told you we’re so glad you’re attending.”

“This is surreal,” Mel said.

“They’re huge,” Rachel added.

Claire’s phone rang.

“I gotta take this guys, Mark will fill you in on the rest!”

Claire answered her phone and walked off. Mark crouched down to get a little closer to the tinies. His huge belly blocked his face as he spoke.

“Guys we have an awesome event planned. You’ll learn how to grow your sales, hire and retain great employees, and tackle some of the food cost issues people have been having. And you’ll get to finally meet your district managers! They’re excited to meet you.”

Claire walked back up. “Alright guys, time to go, hold on tight!”

Mark closed the lid on the briefcase and lifted it up, jostling the tiny passengers.

“Wow. It took everything I had to not scoop one of them up. They’re so small!” Mark exclaimed.

Claire lit a cigarette. “I know, I need to calm my nerves! Let’s get to the conference.”
111.title: Meeting each other

1111.content:
Mark and Claire made their way back to the company car. Claire opened the back door and went to place the briefcase into a specially designed holder. Before she did she gave it a little shake.

“Claire!”

“I couldn’t resist myself,” she giggled.

She took a final drag off of her cigarette and tossed it onto the ground and climbed into the car.

“I want to hold one of them - do you think they’ll let me?” Mark asked.

“Why ask? They’re in no position to say no...”

“Claire, they’re still people...”

“Then just ask. Maybe there’s one or two who like the idea of being grabbed by a giant.”

“Maybe. I’m envious of those two district managers. They’re actually keeping the tiny people in their room.”

“Oh yeah, they’re married aren’t they?”

“Yup, sure are. I haven’t seen what was built for the tiny people to stay in, but I imagine a doll house of sorts.”

“The hotel apparently went all out. This is big news. Really big.” Claire laughed.

Mark pulled into the hotel and conference center. The big digital sign read “Welcome Taco King Annual Conference, and a very special welcome to our Tiny Guests!”

“Alright. Let’s get them inside. And no more shakes.”

Claire grinned.
1111.title: Mark and Claire

11111.content:
Claire and Mark made their way into the conference center. As they walked up to the registration booth they were stopped by Melanie.

“Hey guys, I need one of the tinies to complete his registration - Mike.”

Claire sat the briefcase on the table and opened it.

“Hey guys! Who is Mike?”

“Mike stepped forward and raised his hand.

“Hey Mike, Melanie here needs to work out some kinks in your registration.”

Melanie looked into the briefcase and saw the little man with his hand raised. She reached in and slowly wrapped her fist around him. All of the other tinies jumped out of the way.

“No need to be scared guys, we’re just like you! Just a little bigger,” Claire giggled. “Onward!”

Claire once again shut the briefcase.
11111.title: Stay with Claire and Mark

111111.content:
Melanie walked around the registration booth and could feel the tiny man wiggling in her hand. She carefully rolled him into the table.

“Sorry about just grabbing you. I guess I wasn’t sure what to do and just reacted.”

“No problem, I guess,” Mike said. He looked up at Melanie. Even seated she looked massive. He couldn’t guess her more than five and a half feet tall, but she easily weighed 250 lbs.

“I’m Melanie, but everyone calls me Mel.”

“We have a Mel in our group,” Mike replied.

“Small world,” Melanie said and then blushed. Mike laugher we the reply which made Melanie grin.

“So what’s the issue Mel?”

“There really isn’t one, I was just bored... kidding. I need to verify your address and date of birth.”

They reviewed the information and made sure it was all accurate.

“Alright, I need to get you back to your tiny compadres, all of the other managers will start arriving in a little less than an hour and I want to take a quick smoke break.”

“Um, could I maybe go with you on your smoke break?”

“You smoke?”

“Nope, but figured it’d be fun to get to know someone outside of our tiny world.”

“Uh, sure. That’d be great. I guess you’re okay with me grabbing you again?”

“Grab away.”

Melanie reached down and wrapped her hand around the tiny man and headed out the side door.
111111.title: Stay with Melanie and Mike

choices: Melanie takes Mike to Claire and Mark
1111111.content:

She placed a cigarette in her mouth and lit it, and exhaled a long stream of thick smoke into the air.

“So, Mike, can I ask how old you are?”

“You should never ask a lady her age!”

“Sorry, you’re right...”

“Nah, I like my girls a little older, especially when they’re as pretty as you.”

Melanie blushed. She took a drag off of her cigarette and blew the smoke just over Mike.

“Okay, now I know you’re lying.”

“Nope, not lying. How do you feel about short guys?”

“Never been a fan of short guys. But a handsome man I can hold in the palm of my hand? Now that I find interesting...”

Melanie took another drag off of her cigarette. She blew a long, thick plume of smoke down on Mike, covering his body. He coughed and attempted to bat the smoke away.

“Sadly it’s not meant to be! I smoke and you clearly don’t like it. Too bad!”

“Not true, I was just taken aback!”

“Mmmhmmm... I dunno...”

“Do it again, I’ll prove it.”

Melanie giggled. She took a final drag off of the cigarette and leaned down, her lips only about four inches away from Mike. She pursed her lips and slowly let her smoke cover him. Mike stood unflinching and let’s the smelly warm fog cover his body.

“See, no coughs!”

“I dunno. I feel like we need to test this theory further...but for now I have to get you back to your group.”

Mike started to speak but Melanie curled her giant hand around him before he could.
1111111.title: Stay with Mel and Mike

11111111.content:

“Hey Mark, where’s Claire?”

“She had to run to the restroom.”

“I brought Mike back, can you put him with the others?”

“The briefcase is locked and she has the key. I was gonna run out for a smoke break. I can take him with me I guess.”

“Nope. But I played around and blew smoke on him. He didn’t seem to mind,” Melanie giggled.

“I’m not gonna lie, it was. I gotta get back up front, the attendees will be here soon. Enjoy your smoke.”

Melanie reached out and dropped tiny Mike into Mark’s waiting hand. Mark walked outside.
11111111.title: Melanie takes Mike to Claire and Mark

111111111.content:
Mark sat down in a patio chair with tiny Mike in his hand. He couldn’t believe how good it felt to feel the tiny man squirming around in his grip. He slowly opened his hand and placed the tiny man down on his mountainous belly.

“Mel said you make a great smoke break companion.”

“And the smoke doesn’t bother you?”

“Nah, you learn in the food industry most everyone smokes so you just get used to it.”

Mark held his lit cigarette stood up on his belly beside of the tiny man.

“Wow, you’re as small as the filter. That’s crazy!”

“I bet I can’t even wrap my arms around it!”

Mike walked over and wrapped his arms around the cigarette butt. He couldn’t quite get them around it. Mark playfully lifted the cigarette up and Mike held on.

“Impressive! You’re pretty strong!”

He slid the cigarette back between his fingers and looked at the tiny man laying on the filter.

“And a smoker,” Mike laughed.

“Speaking of which, I need to finish this cigarette. You wanna hop back on my belly?”

Mark brought the cigarette up to his mouth. He felt the tiny man pinned between the butt and his upper lip. He pressed down with his lip as he took a drag and he could feel the tiny man squirm. He only brought the cigarette about an inch or two out of his mouth and blew his smoke on it. He heard tiny coughs and could see the tiny man trying to catch his breath. Mark took a final drag off of the cigarette, and as he removed it from his mouth he picked Mike up between his thumb and forefinger. He tossed the cigarette butt and exhaled a final stream of smoke on Mike.

“Best. Smoke break. Ever.”

He curled his hand around the tiny man and headed back into the conference center.
111111111.title: Stay with Mark and Mike

1111111111.content:
Mark walked into the conference center just in time to see Claire opening the briefcase. He placed Mike amongst the other tiny managers.

“Hey guys, time to meet your district managers!”

Claire turned the briefcase around so the tiny managers could see their big bosses. They were already familiar with each other through video chat, but this was their first time meeting in person.

“Hey guys, it’s nice to finally meet you!”

Sandra and Michael both stood around 5’7”. Michael was average sized with a slightly substantial beer gut. Sandra was chubby and had long, dark curly hair. Neither was particularly attractive, but both looked happy to see their tiny managers.

“Alright guys, we’re here! It’s a pretty cool little set up, a small ten bedroom house on a table!”

The tiny people grabbed their luggage and made their way towards the house.

“I’ll knock on the door when it’s time to head down,” Sandra said. She watched as the tiny people went inside.

“Alright, we got an hour. I want you to fuck me real quick.”

“What? There are ten people in here. What if they see?”

1111111112.content:

“Mark, small problem. The dollar store down the road has a case they’ll sell us. Can you run and grab them?”

“Mike?”

“Oh, sure, no problem.”

Mark wanted Mike back on his cigarette butt. He thought about just putting the little man there, it’s not like he could stop him. But he wanted Mike to want it too. As he pulled out he rested his hand on his belly near Mike, the cigarette jutting out from between his fingers.

“You know,” Mark said, “they’ve budgeted me an assistant. It’s mostly just sending emails and making calls. I could put in a good word for you...”

Mark took a long drag off of his cigarette and blew smoke down at tiny Mike. He loved hearing the little coughs and seeing the tiny man bat away the smoke. He rested his hand closer to Mike this time.

“I guess I’d better start training for the new job, then.” Mike made his way over to the cigarette and climbed up on the filter. Mark put the cigarette in his mouth and let it dangle. He loved the way the tiny man felt in on his lip.

Mark pulled into the dollar store and climbed out of the car. He took a final drag off of the cigarette - squeezing the tiny man as tight as possible - and pulled it from his lips. He plucked Mike off and blew a torrent or warm, acrid smoke at him.

1111111112.title: Mark finds someone else

11111112.content:
Melanie walked back into the conference center and was immediately greeted by Claire.

info.brief_description: Tiny employees get their first chance to meet larger employees
info.description: Tiny cities now dot the map. Taco King has made headlines by being the first “normal” sized business to open tiny restaurants in tiny cities. Taco King is having their yearly manager conference and the tiny managers have been invited. Three days in a world of giants. Anything goes, just no death.
